technical_highlights.responsive_design: Uses Tailwind CSS breakpoints (md:, lg:) for mobile-first design
technical_highlights.animations: Framer Motion for React component animations with viewport detection
technical_highlights.performance: Client-side rendering with mounted state to prevent hydration issues
technical_highlights.accessibility: Proper aria-labels on interactive elements and semantic HTML
technical_highlights.icons: Lucide React for consistent, scalable SVG icons
technical_highlights.type_safety: TypeScript for type checking and better developer experience

common_issues_and_solutions.solution: Replaced emoji with lucide-react icon components
common_issues_and_solutions.prevention: Always use icon libraries instead of Unicode emojis for consistency

common_issues_and_solutions.solution: Added mounted state check before rendering client components
common_issues_and_solutions.prevention: Use 'use client' directive and check window/mounted state

common_issues_and_solutions.solution: Ensure STRIPE_SECRET_KEY and NEXT_PUBLIC_STRIPE_PUBLISHABLE_KEY are set
common_issues_and_solutions.prevention: Always check .env.local file and restart server after changes
